answer:
If you are asking if the 4 month infant vaccines can be given earlier than recommended, please call your immunization provider or call your local public health unit and ask to speak to a public health nurse. You will find the number here. If this is not what you are asking, please submit your question again.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## If you are asking if the 4 month infant vaccines can be given earlier than recommended, please call your immunization provider or call your local public health unit and ask to speak to a public health nurse.

You will find the number here.

## If this is not what you are asking, please submit your question again.

Immunization Nurse
